verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The Saviour is calling, is calling for you, In accents so tender, so loving and true, How can you refuse Him? O heed His sweet call! O, don't turn the Saviour away.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Don't turn the Saviour away from your heart, Don't turn the Saviour away from your heart; O hear Him pleading, O list' to His call, O, don't turn the Saviour away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The Saviour is calling, why turn Him away? Sin's burden is heavy, why longer delay! O heart full of sorrow, there's comfort today; O, don't turn the Saviour away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Saviour is calling, O, can it be true That life everlasting is waiting for you? Come now and receive Him, to Satan say nay; O, don't turn the Saviour away.

verse.name: v4
